name: Tsukuyomi
skill: Deals 4467/5327 DMG to the enemy with the highest ATK, with a high of inflicting Silence.
ability: Very high chance of inflicting Sleep to all foes and slightly decreases ATK speed with a very high chance at the start of each wave.
Sharply increases skill DMG when one of the Three Noble Children is on the team.

additional_data.description: The spirit of the god of night in Japanese mythology. Putting up with his sister Amaterasu and his brother Susanoo has been no easy task with everything going on between them. It all goes back to Susanoo’s being transformed into a little girl by a mysterious curse. At first he searched as hard as he could for a way to lift the curse, but eventually he started thinking things were better as they were.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ Trade at Exchange for 75 Mochi 31/08/2017 - 31/10/2017
◦ The cost increases by 25 Mochi after each exchange
(75, 100, 125, 150, 175)

summon: "I am Tsukuyomi, ruler of the night!"
limit_break: "Never thought someone would have to look after ME for a change."
